Title: The Calling
Writer: Michael Dante DiMartino (created by), Bryan Konietzko (created by), Katie Mattila
Actors: Janet Varney, J.K. Simmons, Kiernan Shipka, Darcy Rose Byrnes
Plot: The airbender children, Jinora, Ikki and Meelo, head out to find the Avatar. Meanwhile, Toph teaches Korra to let go of the past.
